```{r include=FALSE}
library(httr)
url <- "https://rrmaximiliano.github.io/rrmrr-vita/rrmrr-vita.pdf"
hdr <- HEAD(url)
pdf_date <- headers(hdr)[["last-modified"]]
last_updated <- format(
  as.POSIXct(pdf_date, format = "%a, %d %b %Y %H:%M:%S", tz = "GMT"),
  "%B %d, %Y"
)
```
